sn56.102:2.1: 11. Pañcagatipeyyālavagga
sn56.102:3.1: 102. Manussacutinirayasutta
sn56.102:4.1: Atha kho bhagavā parittaṃ nakhasikhāyaṃ paṃsuṃ āropetvā bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn56.102:4.2: “taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, katamaṃ nu kho bahutaraṃ—
sn56.102:4.3: yo vāyaṃ mayā paritto nakhasikhāyaṃ paṃsu āropito, ayaṃ vā mahāpathavī”ti?
sn56.102:4.6: appamattakāyaṃ bhagavatā paritto nakhasikhāyaṃ paṃsu āropito.
sn56.102:4.7: Saṅkhampi na upeti, upanidhampi na upeti, kalabhāgampi na upeti mahāpathaviṃ upanidhāya bhagavatā paritto nakhasikhāyaṃ paṃsu āropito”ti.
sn56.102:4.8: “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye manussā cutā manussesu paccājāyanti;
sn56.102:4.9: atha kho eteva bahutarā sattā ye manussā cutā niraye paccājāyanti … pe ….
